subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
lead_paragraph: The man in charge of the Yankees acknowledged that, in the middle of a full-blown recession, some of the team’s ticket prices for 2009 look a little steep.
snippet: The man in charge of the Yankees acknowledged that, in the middle of a full-blown recession, some of the team’s ticket prices for 2009 look a little steep.
